statements: SELECT * FROM court_cases;
SELECT case_id, case_name FROM court_cases WHERE deadline_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT case_name, case_type, case_status FROM court_cases WHERE case_status = 'Closed';
SELECT case_name, deadline_date FROM court_cases ORDER BY deadline_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE case_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE case_type = 'Civil' ORDER BY deadline_date DESC;
SELECT case_name, case_status FROM court_cases WHERE deadline_date > '2022-01-01' AND case_status = 'Open';
SELECT DISTINCT case_type FROM court_cases WHERE case_status = 'Closed' ORDER BY case_type ASC;
SELECT case_id, case_name, deadline_date FROM court_cases WHERE case_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY case_id DESC, deadline_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cases, MAX(deadline_date) AS latest_deadline FROM court_cases WHERE case_type = 'Criminal';
SELECT * FROM court_cases;
SELECT case_name, deadline FROM court_cases WHERE case_type = 'criminal';
SELECT party_name, party_type FROM case_parties WHERE party_type = 'defendant';
SELECT * FROM court_cases ORDER BY case_name ASC;
SELECT party_name, case_name FROM case_parties JOIN court_cases ON case_parties.case_id = court_cases.case_id;
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE case_type='civil';
SELECT case_name, deadline FROM court_cases WHERE deadline > '2022-01-31';
SELECT party_name, case_name FROM case_parties INNER JOIN court_cases ON case_parties.case_id=court_cases.case_id ORDER BY party_name ASC;
SELECT case_name, party_name FROM court_cases INNER JOIN case_parties ON case_parties.case_id=court_cases.case_id WHERE party_type='plaintiff';
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE case_name LIKE '%criminal%' ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE lawyer_id = 'a21d5bd5-9871-4b3d-bd57-2faa9254f5f5';
SELECT case_name, schedule_date FROM court_cases WHERE deadline_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT c.case_id, c.case_name, l.lawyer_name FROM court_cases c JOIN lawyers l ON c.lawyer_id = l.lawyer_id;
SELECT * FROM law_firms WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT lawyer_name, lawyer_email FROM lawyers WHERE law_firm_id = '7d8f90ac-ffa1-485f-bb3c-2e458d93a158';
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE schedule_date > '2022-01-01' AND deadline_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT case_id, case_name, lawyer_id FROM court_cases WHERE case_description LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT law_firm_name, location FROM law_firms WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM lawyers l JOIN law_firms lf ON l.law_firm_id = lf.law_firm_id;

SELECT c.case_id, c.case_name, l.lawyer_name, lf.location FROM court_cases c JOIN lawyers l ON c.lawyer_id = l.lawyer_id JOIN law_firms lf ON l.law_firm_id = lf.law_firm_id WHERE lf.location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM court_cases;
SELECT case_name, client_name, court_date FROM court_cases WHERE case_type = 'Civil';
SELECT * FROM lawyers ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT document_name, upload_date FROM case_documents WHERE case_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM lawyers WHERE specialty = 'Criminal Defense' ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM court_cases ORDER BY court_date DESC, case_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT case_name, client_name, court_date FROM court_cases WHERE case_type = 'Criminal' AND court_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY court_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT c.case_name, l.full_name AS lawyer_name, c.court_date FROM court_cases c JOIN lawyers l ON c.case_id = l.lawyer_id ORDER BY c.court_date LIMIT 5;
SELECT cd.*, c.case_name FROM case_documents cd JOIN court_cases c ON cd.case_id = c.case_id WHERE cd.upload_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY cd.upload_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT d.case_id, c.case_name, d.description AS deadline_description FROM deadlines d JOIN court_cases c ON d.case_id = c.case_id ORDER BY d.deadline_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM law_firm;
SELECT lawyer_id, lawyer_name, specialty FROM lawyer ORDER BY specialty ASC;
SELECT schedule_date, deadline FROM case_schedule WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT law_firm_name, address, phone_number FROM law_firm WHERE law_firm_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM case_file WHERE file_type = 'pdf' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM law_firm ORDER BY law_firm_name DESC, address
SELECT lawyer_name, specialty FROM lawyer WHERE specialty='Criminal Law' AND law_firm_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT DISTINCT(c.case_type), l.lawyer_name FROM court_case c JOIN lawyer l ON c.lawyer_id = l.lawyer_id ORDER BY c.case_type ASC
SELECT cf.file_name, cf.file_type FROM case_file cf JOIN court_case cc ON cf.case_id = cc.case_id WHERE cc.case_name='Civil Rights Case' AND cf.file_type='PDF'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM court_case WHERE lawyer_id='456e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
